EmailTemplate.name: Desking Training Completed
EmailTemplate.subject: VinSolutions Desking Training Completed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Training__c.Training_Contact__c},
This email serves as written acknowledgement that you and your team have completed the additional training on the VinConnect Desking module and have stated that youâ€™re comfortable in making the transition to the new tool.
As we discussed before, your team will have continued access to the Legacy Desking module for the remainder of the week; however, this upcoming Monday we will be discontinuing the use of Legacy Desking and work solely with new VinConnect Desking module.
Along with this confirmation, we would like to send out a special thank you for your continued support, as well as, the proactive approach you and your team have taken in becoming proficient in the VinConnect Desking module.
At VinSolutions, we take a tremendous amount of pride in providing our dealers with a set of tools that help to drive the bottom-line and in the end, help you own your market. Therefore, your continued, proactive use and feedback is vital as we continue to move forward and drive change in our industry together.
Below, we have included some additional training on the VinConnect Desking module for continued learning:
http://www.brainshark.com/cox/vu?pi=zHgzgo4MWzIbsGz0
If you have any additional questions do not hesitate to reach out to your Performance Manager.
Thank you, again, for your participation and choosing VinSolutions as your strategic partner!
Your partners over at VinSolutions
